extensionDescription.message: Removes Ads and the user interaction tracking from content on Facebook™

optsTitle.message: Tracking & Ad Removal for Facebook™ Options

optsReloadNotice.message: Changes will cause all Facebook tabs to be automatically reloaded after this page is closed
optsReloadNotice.description: Options page notice about page reload after making changes

optsInternal.message: Remove tracking values from internal links (If something breaks, try disabling this first)

optsInlineVids.message: Inline videos on mobile (Only affects mobile; May increase data usage)

optsSuggest.message: Hide inline suggestions (eg: Suggested Posts, People You May Know)

optsStyleLabel.message: Custom CSS style to be added to modified elements:

optsUserRules.message: Custom CSS selectors to hide, one per-line. FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY

optsUserRulesHover.message: If you identify a new selector, please submit it in a PR

optsLogging.message: Display log messages in the console
